title: Ugh. Forum Wars. What's better than Comic Sans?
content:
I seem to have gotten myself into a bind on a popular Mac forum.   
   
I posted the "Chalkboard vs Comic Sans" argument. The consensus was that Chalkboard is better than Comic Sans. However, I proposed that Apple could have bundled a better handwriting font that would do the same job as Comic Sans/Chalkboard.   
   
What would such a font be?
author: mga
